description: Since according to his feedback it is the least of his priorities, he should not advertise it in the application description.
summary: Developer should remove the claim for PDF

description: Works fine with HP scanner and HP Web Cam
It was fine the first day but the second it just has kept crashing all the time.
Can't find my Canon Lide 700F while the Ubuntu Document Scanner app can. Too bad.
Took a very long time for a 9MB application to install. And then it couldn't find my Epson ET-2650 scanner/printer. So I uninstalled it straight away.
Other scan software can see my wifi Brother MFC-9130CW this software can not. What I really want is my old Simple-Scan to work but can not install it on Ubuntu 20.04.
summary: Can not access wifi Brother scanner

description: just kept freezing, nothing happens, if only ubuntu had software that actually works!!

I have a Canon PIXMA TR8520 multifunction device which comes with is a scanner, printer, copier and fax machine all-in-one system. Ubuntu 22.04 automatically installed a driver that is working with its printing function, so that I can send documents to my printer through the USB port. Yet, it appears that it did not automatically install scanner support for my device. So, when I open this Scanlite application on my desktop, I get an error message saying: "The SANE (Scanner Access Made Easy) could not find any device. Check that your scanner is plugged in and turned on or check your scanner setup." I tried to resolve this error message by looking up my scanner in the SANE project's website to find out what package I needed to install in my computer, in order to get it to work. By doing that, I discovered that sane-escl.5 works with my Canon PIXMA TR8520 scanner. (I found this information at http://sane-project.org/man/sane-escl.5.html.) Then, I tried to find out what I could install in order to get sane-escl.5 installed in my system. So, I found a page in the Ubuntu manual that told me that sane-escl.5 was included in libsane-common package. I made sure that this library is installed in my system and it still won't work!
No detecta el scaner. No arranca.
No sirve en ubuntu, ¿como puedo eliminarlo?
summary: No srive en ubuntu, ¿como puedo eliminarlo?
